#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char** argv) {

    ////////// DO NOT EDIT! //////////
    string path = argv[1];        //
    //////////////////////////////////  

    ifstream file(path);
    if (!file.is_open()) {
        cerr << "Could not open the file." << endl;
        return 1;
    }

    string line;
    int lineCount = 0;
    int charCount = 0;

    while (getline(file, line)) {
        lineCount++;
        charCount += line.length(); // count characters in the line
    }

    file.close();

    cout << lineCount << " line(s)" << endl;
    cout << charCount << " character(s)" << endl;

    return 0;
}
